required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Suicidality and Suicide Attempt Among HIV Patients on Efavirenz-containing Versus Efavirenz-free Antiretroviral Regimens
clinical_study.official_title: The Risk of Suicidality and Suicide Attempt Among HIV Patients Initiating Efavirenz-containing Versus Efavirenz-free Antiretroviral Regimens

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to compare the frequency of suicidality and suicide attempt among HIV patients starting treatment with Efavirenz and with patients starting treatment with other HIV medications.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of cases of Suicidality, defined as suicidal ideation and suicide attempt
primary_outcome.time_frame: Patients will be followed from date of index fill of efavirenz or comparator antiretrovirals until earliest of date of suicidality claim,30th day after the last day of the days supply of the index medication,last day of enrollment or end of study period

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of suicide attempt cases, defined as an inpatient or emergency room claim with at least one ICD-9-CM code for suicide attempt
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Patients will be followed from date of index fill of efavirenz or comparator antiretrovirals until earliest of date of suicidality claim,30th day after the last day of the days supply of the index medication,last day of enrollment or end of study period

Patients will be followed from date of index fill of efavirenz or comparator antiretrovirals until earliest of date of suicidality claim,30th day after the last day of the days supply of the index medication,last day of enrollment or end of study period
secondary_outcome.description: Expanded definition, defined as an inpatient of emergency department claim for suicidal attempt or a claim for toxic effects of poisoning, open wound to elbow, wrist or forearm, of asphyxiation plus a diagnosis of psychiatric disorders

arm_group.description: Patients initiating an Efavirenz-containing antiretroviral regimen

study_pop.textblock: Patients in a commercial insurance database and a Medicaid database

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- At least 6 months of enrollment before first prescription
- Antiretroviral naive
Exclusion Criteria:
- No diagnosis of HIV on patient record
- Age < 12 years
